name: Stopbabycrying
0:
”Alexa, open Stop baby crying”
”Alexa, start Stop baby crying”
”Alexa, launch Stop baby crying”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stop baby crying
des:
"Stop baby crying" is a skill that plays environmental sounds which make a baby stop crying.
It plays the sounds like a vacuum cleaner, a hair dryer and TV fuzz for a minute and 20 seconds.

"Alexa, open Stop baby crying"
"Alexa, start Stop baby crying"
"Alexa, launch Stop baby crying"
Let’ say above and get started.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
